column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: Nice staff, great location, good breakfast
column4: room a bit small (in particular desk and dining table)

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: Everything was perfect. Very good room, comfortable beds, very clean, friendly and attentive staff to our requests. We will come back with pleasure!

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: Location is excellent for a business trip and especially if you are working with EU institutions.  If as a tourist, it is not such a long walk to the main sights such as Grand Place
column4: Traffic noise might be a problem in some rooms, but this not something that the hotel can do anything about

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: It is great that they have the little shop on the ground floor where you can buy quick snacks and drinks!

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: Spacious, modern room with everything you need for a short term stay. The kitchenette is only basically equipped so not for more than a two week stay.
column4:
Internet, although was high speed still was of low quality with it dropping out regularly. The room itself was very nice, but the smallest TV on the wall, didn't make sense..
Kitchenette needs more utensils and pans.

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: Great Breakfast reception staff really friendly

column2: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bruxelles Europe Aparthotel
column3: The customer service is excellent very kind and helpful information
